description: Returns information about a list of specified managed workgroups in your account.

nested_items.name: managedWorkgroups
nested_items.description: The returned array of managed workgroups.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date of the managed workgroup.

nested_items.name: managedWorkgroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the managed workgroup.

nested_items.name: managedWorkgroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the managed workgroup.

nested_items.name: sourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the managed workgroup in the AWS Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the managed workgroup.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, make the call again using the returned token.
